Module it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher
Package it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.client.view

Interface View

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientView
All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, Gui, VirtualView
public interface View
This interface contains method prototypes that are called by the virtual view on server. This virtual view uses this method to send ask messages without knowing how the client view is implemented.

    • askTowerColor

      void askTowerColor(boolean[] towerColorChosen)
      Asks the player to choose his tower color.
      Parameters:
      towerColorChosen - the arrays of tower color, available and not.

      Parameters:
      wizards - the list of available wizards.

    • askCharacterCardParameters

      void askCharacterCardParameters(int id)
      Asks the player to insert the parameters of the character card he wants in order to build the effect.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the character card the player wants to play.

      void showErrorMessage(ErrorTypeID errorTypeID)
      Shows to the player that an error occurs during the execution of a method.
